website_summaries.verdict: A popular choice for charcoal detoxifying facial bars.
pros: Effective at ridding pores of toxins and impurities
Best-suited for oily and combination skin types
cons: Not suggested for dry skin types

customer_reviews.title: DISGUSTING SMELL.
customer_reviews.text: This soap arrived today, and almost immediately I used it in the shower to clean my face. When the description says fragrance free, it means there is no PLEASANT fragrance. There was definitely a horrible fragrance from this soap. It was so bad, I was unable to get the smell off my face until I had kept rinsing it. I threw it straight into the garbage. I don't know if it would have moisturized my face or not. I did not give it a chance to find out. UGH. if I could have given it no stars I would have!
customer_reviews.author: Scottish Kate from Virginia.

customer_reviews.title: I'm never using another body wash again
customer_reviews.text: I have always HATED bar soap and I never loved any body wash... both dried out my skin and always felt like it left residue. This is the only thing I have tried... and I've tried sooo many things... that has worked for me. I love this bar. It leaves my skin feeling hydrated and clean without that squeaky yucky feeling that comes with soaps stripping your natural oils and leaving soap residue. Using this with their moisturizer right after the shower before toweling off has transformed my usually very dry skin and my KP. I'm never using another brand again. Finally found my ride or die.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: ZERO STARS IF I COULD
customer_reviews.text: The first box came with both ends broken, so as I'm waiting for the replacement I idly looked at the back and noticed the box contains a LOT more ingredients than they show online here. And I discover it contains carbomer which WASN'T listed on Amazon site, which I can't use. I'm not even certain that's legal. I am furious, no one likes to be mislead and waste their money. I would give it ZERO stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: l

customer_reviews.title: Glad I tried it
customer_reviews.text: Generally I like this bar even tho I've been using it less than a week. It definitely has a scent, but it's not too much. It cleanses well and does not make my skin feel tight, however, for me it has minimal, to no moisturizing qualities. Maybe the moisture will increase in the weeks to come. I use it morning and night. One benefit is it seems to clear up my pimples because it dries them out, that's why I feel it's not moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: Lorelei

customer_reviews.title: Great Moisturizing Cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I use it in the bath tub when showering primarily, and it's like bathing with moisturizer. I have Sjogren's Syndrome and with that you are 'super dry' - and this really helps. The only caution I offer is to be careful in the tub, because it does make it a little slippery.
customer_reviews.author: Expressionality

customer_reviews.title: Smells AWFUL
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I don’t actually know if this stuff works, because when I opened the box I was hit with the smell. Supposedly fragrance free, but it’s definitely not. Smells like a mix of flowery perfume and gain laundry detergent. Boxed it right back up and requested a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Tess Lane

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: My skin is easily irritated by scented soaps and lotions so I get to use this boring stuff. No colors, no smells but it delivers though on moisture. I appreciate the minimal packaging. I plan on buying this again when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: TheMandyP

customer_reviews.title: Great soap
customer_reviews.text: I use this soap in the shower for whole body and face. I have sensitive skin that drys out easily. I wouldn't say it is a moisturizing soap but it doesn't leave your skin feel dry and tight like general soaps do. It just leaves your skin feeling clean. I don't really notice any smell to it at all which I like. Scents give me headaches. I moisturize with lotion after. I wish it wasn't so expensive though. When you use it for whole body the cost adds up. I alternate using this with the Vanicream soap.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Trying something else
customer_reviews.text: I have eczema and keratosis pilaris. This bar was recommended to me. I think it moisturized well but I also used other products. My main issue is that I feel like it didn’t do a great job of cleansing! I am very active and I would find I would still smell after a shower. Not good
customer_reviews.author: Princesstiana

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: The dermatologist recommended me to use this to wash my face since my face is combination oily and dry. The first time I tried it it really dried my face out and made it peel but I tried it for a couple more days and no changes so I assume it’s not for me
customer_reviews.author: Poindextermomx3

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect  for me
customer_reviews.text: I've used this brand before, it is good for sensitive skin. But I cannot tell that it is moisturizing. Maybe it's my skin, but I feel like it is a little drying.
customer_reviews.author: Resa Ann

customer_reviews.title: eventually it smelled!
customer_reviews.text: I used for a while but it made me smell bad after a while!
customer_reviews.author: KLAS

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing and non-irritant
customer_reviews.text: I recently had some persistent eczema on my arms, and I can see that my skin is getting better w the use of this soap.
customer_reviews.author: Dunja

customer_reviews.title: This is great for washing face. Very mild
customer_reviews.text: I was told to use CeraVe by my sister and her dermatologist recomend their products. Nothing fancy just works
customer_reviews.author: Chinchat

customer_reviews.title: Does not dry my skin out....
customer_reviews.text: I have eczema on my arms and back and I went to see a dermatologist who gave me a few samples of CeraVe to try. I like that it's not drying out my skin like most bars of soap and for that it gets 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: K Salter

customer_reviews.title: Mine did have a mild fragrance to it.
customer_reviews.text: Mine did have a mild detergent like fragrance to it and a bit of a gritty texture or feel to the lather.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Gentle in sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: It was prescribed by my dermatologist a few years ago for an all-over body rash that she couldn't pinpoint the origin. I bought the whole line of CeraVe products, soap, moisturizer, and face cleanser. It helped clear up the rash and I still use it. The soap is hard to find, and sometimes I have to ask for it from the pharmacy to order it. That's why I order it now online.
customer_reviews.author: PAMF

customer_reviews.title: The very best I've ever had Thank You again so much
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is I'm so glad to finally find a great face cleanser that doesn't hurt my extremely senitive skin Yes indeed it works so very good I'm gonna order more right now so I have it Thank You so so much and God Bless to all
customer_reviews.author: Ocean Skye

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by my dermatologist
customer_reviews.text: It is unscented & doesn't seem to exacerbate the itching of my atopic dermatitis. My skin likes it:)
customer_reviews.author: FL-Jan

customer_reviews.title: Great Products
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this soap and other CeraVe products for about a year now and they are all wonderful! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: S. J. Kunin

customer_reviews.title: left my back dry and itchy
customer_reviews.text: I like how soapy it is but it dissolves pretty quick. It also made my back very dry and itchy. it might work for someone else but it didn't work for me. =(
customer_reviews.author: Gina Calderon

customer_reviews.title: Good for My Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and this soap cleanses my face without irritating it. I’ve bought several bars. What lol buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Djuli

customer_reviews.title: Not Unscented, just "fragrance free", strong chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: This may be fragrance free, but it is not unscented. It has a pungent, chemical smell. Very disappointed. I hate smelly stuff, it gives me a headache. To be fair though, it does leave my skin softer.
customer_reviews.author: schützenjunge

customer_reviews.title: CONTAINS FRAGRANCE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for some gentle soap for skin on actuate but its got fragrance that burned my face! Do not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Really good face bar!
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and this doesn't dry it out too much but it does get all the extra oil off my face. It smells good and it isn't too harsh. I use this every morning and night and my face stays clear!
customer_reviews.author: Jenesis Wilson

customer_reviews.title: A winner from Cerave!
customer_reviews.text: Love all things Cerave. This soap is for face body and it lathers up beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: juls

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best soap ever! You have to try this one, it leave your skin moisturized. I will never use anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Kendy Sumlin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little bar...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing little bar of non soap cleanser! There is absolutely no scent, my skin always feels calm out the shower. No tight feeling! The bar feels like very very fine abrasive. Don’t worry it’s not going to hurt you! It’s just the texture.
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: Expensive
customer_reviews.text: I have eczema, and need this, but it’s just too expensive for the amount you get.
customer_reviews.author: Ton

customer_reviews.text: I read reviews no strong scent. My bar was great. Ordered more!
customer_reviews.author: Bren

customer_reviews.title: This soap is so great. The CeraVe products I've tried (this
customer_reviews.text: This soap is so great. The CeraVe products I've tried (this, lotion, and facial soap for very dry skin) have all been so great for my skin which is extremely dry due to a medical condition and the medication I take to help said condition.

customer_reviews.title: Great daily use
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t smell that great but it makes my skin extremely soft and not so dull. It’s doesn't dry my face and I use it just about everyday as a cleaser. I don’t wear makeup so I’m not sure how it would do with removal. If you are looking for a gentle, daily cleanser, give it a try.

customer_reviews.text: My favorite bar soap!! Great for all skin types, especially sensitive skin. It does not overdry at all!

customer_reviews.title: ... this soap for over a year now and it's great! I have incredibly sensitive skin that doesn't get ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying this soap for over a year now and it's great! I have incredibly sensitive skin that doesn't get along well with way too many things. This is a soothing exception that quiets my eczema and easily combats dryness. I only wish it were cheaper.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! My skin feels clean and soft. I have one of the forms of psoriasis and was having trouble with cleansers. This is just what I needed.

customer_reviews.title: nice, gentle soap
customer_reviews.text: Nice and gentle formula. I also really like the scent.

customer_reviews.text: when I got these 2 items opening the one bar it was only half a bar the other was OK --never have I got 1/2 a bar before

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Makes it easier to travel and do my skin care routine. Def a staple for when I travel

customer_reviews.text: This soap is great! but the two I received were expired, old or defective. Smelled like old lipstick - that "off" smell. :(

customer_reviews.title: Great face soap!
customer_reviews.text: I love this face soap! Simple and it lasts a long time. I use Cerave moisture cream which lasts forever!

customer_reviews.title: great soap if you have allergies to regular soap or ...
customer_reviews.text: great soap if you have allergies to regular soap or atopic dermatitis. cheaper than the liquid itching soap from cerave. the soap last longer than liquid soap.

customer_reviews.title: Wow! New favorite skin care
customer_reviews.text: My skin feels so great after showering. Now applying lotion after showering is optional for me. :D

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have always trusted CeraVe products. However, I find that I am allergic to this bar of cleansing soap.

customer_reviews.text: Great price! I normally pay this price for one in the stores

customer_reviews.title: great for itchy irritated skin
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my face. My skin has gotten very sensitive as I get older and this product was recommended to me by my dermatologist and helps a lot.

customer_reviews.title: Makeup remover!
customer_reviews.text: Cleans and softness skin it takes away all my makeup to😄
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: hydrating
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this bar. This bar feels amazing when you wash your face!!! I gave it 5 stars because i love it. This is now a part of my daily routine. My skin feels clean and so soft. The scent is tolerable. I have a sensitive nose and the scent of the bar was off putting and i was worried. Yes- i Sniffed it before using it out of curiosity. But it didn't smell like anything when i washed my face. No lingering scent. I also have VERY sensitive skin and i had no irritations from this cleansing bar.
customer_reviews.author: Ste7ani3

customer_reviews.title: Hydration to the max
customer_reviews.text: This hydrated my skin so much! It is definitely accurate how much it hydrates the skin!
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is real nice!
customer_reviews.text: This product is creamy soft on the skin. I tested it on my very wintery dry hands. I worked up a lather rinsed and dried my hands. I'll say my hands do suffer at winter time, after 1 use my hands felt soft & moisturizer without any added scent. So using it while bathing left a nice soft feeling all over. Now I'd love to try the cream. I recommended it...to my dry friend's. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Robud B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for three years now. Makes a big difference with my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: A dermatologist recommended this product as part of a regimen to prevent ...
customer_reviews.text: A dermatologist recommended this product as part of a regimen to prevent recurrence of a rather nasty dermatitis. I was happy to find the bar form on Amazon for an affordable price as the liquid is beyond my budget. I appreciate that the product cleanses and a bar lasts a long time but I can't say it hydrates. My skin is drier and itchier than when I was using homemade lye soap. I'll stick with the dermatologist's recommendation while my six bars last but I will re-evaluate before purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best bar soap I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best bar soap I have ever used. I use this for my body as well as my face, per recommendation of a dermatologist. Inexpensive and it lathers up really well. One bar lasts about 2 months for 1 adult using it daily all over.
customer_reviews.author: Mother of Broccoli

customer_reviews.title: Best Soap for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: The best soap for dry skin. Recommend by my dermatologist. I've been using the soap, body lotion and liquid foaming face cleaner for two years and absolutely recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does not dry your face out, and gets all the yuck and oil off your face

customer_reviews.text: Really helps my skin stay hydrated. I suffer from eczema and Cerave helps me feel better.

customer_reviews.title: Skin-sational!
customer_reviews.text: Non-drying, great lather. Nice addition to other Cera Ve products.

customer_reviews.title: Gentle on skin
customer_reviews.text: This bar soap is great for sensitive skin. It has been one of the things we have switched to when our dermatotgist recommended it because of a skin rash. It is absolutely the best.
customer_reviews.author: chelsea s.

customer_reviews.title: Fan.
customer_reviews.text: We're obsessed. I use it for my face cleanser as well and honestly, it is as good or better than most I've tried. It gets all of the makeup off, and I mean ALL. And it is hydrating. We've been using this soap in the shower for a year or two and before this arrived in the mail we had to use something else for a day, 1 day, and my skin was so much dryer than normal after that one shower, it made me even more of a believer.

customer_reviews.title: My review is about the bar soap.
customer_reviews.text: My review is about the bar soap. The soap box is so damaged I do not understand how that is okay. I attached pictures

customer_reviews.title: it is recommended by my son's dermatologist
customer_reviews.text: Soap works well, it is recommended by my son's dermatologist.

customer_reviews.title: Dried out my skin
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this soap because I was given a tub of their lotion and absolutely loved it. Sadly, I found that this soap left my skin feeling very dry.
customer_reviews.author: p2bim

customer_reviews.title: Great soap for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: Do my dismay, I have such sensitive skin that I can only use certain products if I don't want my arms and face to shed copious amount of skin, akin to Hollywood's depiction of vampire standing in sunlight. I've usually stuck with Dove for Men but I wanted something that doesn't require that much effort to rinse off and doesn't smell that strong. After a lengthy search, I settled on CeraVe soap. It is very gentle and doesn't have any perfume so I don't smell like a French sex worker. It does take a little more rinsing to wash the soap off but I'm told that's a good thing. All in all, I'm very happy with this soap.
customer_reviews.author: Rayn

customer_reviews.title: Broke My Face Out In Small Bumps
customer_reviews.text: Bought this since the liquid was not available. This bar broke my face out in small bumps everytime I used it. I'd stop using until the bumps disappeared then use again. The bumps returned. Did this about 5 times with same results. Don't want to waste bar so using to wash my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Same Day TYVM

customer_reviews.title: Cost efficient and very Moisturizering
customer_reviews.text: I have very dry skin and this doesn't dry out my skin and it makes my skin feel very clean. I didn't think I would like the bar compared to liquid but it was much cheaper so I decided to give it a try. And I actually like it better because it seems to last a lot longer and its just as easy as using the liquid. I brought this in April and I probably have enough to last several more months.
customer_reviews.author: KitKat

customer_reviews.title: No scent, very soothing, but feel clean
customer_reviews.text: I am now a rabid fan of CeraVe products. This soap is working well for my very dry, itchy skin. The bar is lasting forever. Feels great, lathers fabulously, expensive but I'm worth it :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yay Cerave cleanser bar
customer_reviews.text: I love Cerave products, but I'm trying to move away from plastic bottles where possible, so I'm all about the bar soap. I don't know if there ever will be an option for moisturizers and lotions but at least for cleanser, it's less plastic. It's a very soothing facial cleanser and I've bought a bar for both shower and sink.
customer_reviews.author: Shee

customer_reviews.title: Acne prone skin at 62yr.
customer_reviews.text: I love it ! I'm 62 yrs old have had acne ALL my life ! This is the best i have found. It lathers good and easy to rinse off. It leaves my face feeling so soft an NO irritation at all. The more i use it the more even toned it looks.
customer_reviews.author: catz2124

customer_reviews.title: Eczema Relief
customer_reviews.text: If you suffer from Eczema, this is a quick fix. Make sure to use it with the cream and you WILL NOTICE a difference within 2 days, or sooner. My itching was horrible and painful due to digging and scratching. I will buy this soap from Amazon, every time going forward. It is too pricey in the Walgreens, WalMart or CVS. Thank you Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Rain

customer_reviews.title: Gentle on my skin
customer_reviews.text: This soap is super gentle on my skin, not drying me up either. Its been a couple of months since I got mine and still satisfied. However, because I use it as my second facial cleanser I would rather have one in a bottle. More for sanitary reasons than anything else.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kiss

customer_reviews.title: IT REALLY WORKS FOR DRY SKIN
customer_reviews.text: I Have really dry irritable skin. I bring out in hives and even Dove soap is drying. CeraVe has really helped heal and moisturize and hydrate my skin. It stopped my skin from burning and just feeling dry and tight. It Really Works!!

customer_reviews.text: I was told by my dermotologist to use the Cerave Cream on my dry skin. It worked great; so great that I bought a bar of the Cerave Soap. This is now the only soap my family uses. I highly recommend.

customer_reviews.text: I keep this in a soap dish in my gym bag, no leaky soap bottles here! Perfect, gentle cleaning. I always use moisturizer, but this isn't drying.

customer_reviews.title: the best soap I've EVER used
customer_reviews.text: Hands down, the best soap I've EVER used. I keep getting random compliments on my soft skin ever since I started using this bar of soap. If you're like me, I used to prefer liquid body wash, but trust me - the bar is the best. I found that Cerave bars form a better and more luscious lather on a loofah than the liquid does. Seriously, don't think twice!

product_meta.title: CeraVe Hydrating Cleanser Bar | 4.5 Ounce | Soap-Free Body and Face Cleanser Bar | Fragrance Free and Non-Irritating
product_meta.description:
Size:1 Pack

Developed with dermatologist, CeraVe Hydrating Cleanser Bar gently removes dirt, oil and makeup without disrupting skin's natural protective barrier. In addition to three essential ceramides and hyaluronic acid, this bar soap also features 5% CeraVe Moisturizing Cream and patented MVE Delivery Technology to release a steady stream of hydration throughout the day and night.

 * Fragrance-free
 * Non-comedogenic
 * Accepted by the National Eczema Association



Key Ingredients:

 * MVE Technology: This patented delivery system continually releases moisturizing ingredients for 24-hour hydration
 * Ceramides: Essential for healthy skin, ceramides help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier
 * Hyaluronic Acid: This ingredient attracts hydration to the skin’s surface and helps the skin retain moisture
feature_bullets: [ CLEANSE & RESTORE ] Ceramides help to restore the skin barrier. Uniquely formulated to thoroughly cleanse without stripping skin of its natural moisture
[ KEEP SKIN HYDRATED LONGER ] Helps lock in moisture 3x longer. Formula contains 5% CeraVe Moisturizing Cream to hydrate and nourish skin
[ DEVELOPED WITH DERMATOLOGISTS ] All CeraVe products are developed with industry experts
[ PATENTED TECHNOLOGY ] Utilizes patented MVE controlled release technology to help replenish ceramides and deliver long lasting moisturization
[ GENTLE ON SKIN ] Suitable for face, body, and even hands. Fragrance free, non-comedogenic, non-drying and non-irritating
